subject: EXCLUSIVE OFFER: Wholesale Hair Dryers 70% OFF!!!
body:
AMAZING DEALS!

Dear Business Owner,

We have received your contact from our marketing database. We are offering WHOLESALE PRICES on professional hair styling equipment!

- Premium Hair Dryers - $15 each (min order 100)
- Styling Tools Package - $50 each
- FREE SHIPPING on orders over $500

Contact us NOW at sales@dealstore.net

Limited time offer! Act fast!

Best regards,
DealStore Marketing Team

To unsubscribe, click here: http://bit.ly/unsub12345

metadata.reason: Promotional spam email, not a warranty claim
